main event: A civilian reported a probable balloon sighting in Pawling, New York on 8th August 1957 at 21:35 EST.
interesting points: The observation was classified as a 'probable balloon sighting' and was deemed to have insufficient data for evaluation.
The report does not contain any photographs of the observed object.
The sighting was categorized as a Ground-Visual observation, indicating that the object was seen from the ground.
The weather conditions at the time of the sighting were described as slightly hazy.
The document contains handwritten and typed text from the Project Blue Book, which was the US Air Force's official project to investigate UFOs.
sighted object: one object, categorized as a probable balloon
